title: What are the features of Java 5, Java 6, Java 7 and Java 8? - Quora

response.answer_text: java 5 features  AutoBoxing/UnBoxingAnnotationEnhanced for each loopGenericsvarargsstatic importsConcurrent classesScanner classesTypeSafe enumsjava 6 features Support for a scripting languageNew Java compiler API(allows to run script with java)New JVM (allows to run script, even heap is full)JDBC 4.0Integrated webserviceJAXBJAXWSjava 7 featuresMuhammed Younus Attari's answer to What are best features in java7? java 8 featuresMuhammed Younus Attari's answer to What are the list of Java 8 features? Finally all in one place.
